title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1355/88 of 18 May 1988 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3847/87 establishing the list of vessels exceeding eight metres length overall permitted to use within certain coastal areas of the Community beam trawls whose aggregate length exceeds eight metres
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1355/88
of 18 May 1988
amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3847/87 establishing the list of vessels exceeding eight metres length overall permitted to use within certain coastal areas of the Community beam trawls whose aggregate length exceeds eight metres
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The vessels referred to in the Annex of this Regulation are added to the Annex of Regulation (EEC) No 3847/87.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 May 1988.
For the Commission
António CARDOSO E CUNHA
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 288, 11. 10. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 371, 30. 12. 1987, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 363, 23. 12. 1987, p. 1.
